question_text: Select two consequences of exceeding your mobile data cap.
answer_options: Your device will shut down automatically
You may incur extra charges from your provider
Your connection may be throttled or slowed down
correct_answer: You may incur extra charges from your provider
Your connection may be throttled or slowed down
explanation: Exceeding a data cap may lead to overage fees or slower speeds for the rest of the billing cycle.
